Package ra.db.connection

Class ConcurrentConnection

java.lang.Object
ra.db.connection.ConcurrentConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable, DatabaseConnection, KeepAlive, KeepAvailable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockConcurrentConnection
public class ConcurrentConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeepAvailable
Provide execute SQL statement using a keep database connection, and the connection is thread safe.
